description.pins: An array containing one array for each location marked on the map. Must contain latitude (lat) and longitude (lng). Can contain a tooltip and an icon.
description.startPosition: Sets the start location of the map. Must contain latitude (lat), longitude (lng) and a zoom value between 5-20
description.mapStyle: Theming of the map (pale, dark, color, default)
description.height: A css height value including unit (px, vh, %)
description.fullWidth: True or false, sets the width of the element.
